sa-voice-desc-Csaba: Being a BNB Chain Student Ambassador has enriched my life with the most significant amount of Web3 and crypto knowledge a student can learn. While having fun at events, I also enjoy the exclusive perks that a Student Ambassador receives.
sa-voice-desc-Kenzi: BNB Chain gave me an outstanding opportunity to become a part of this rapidly growing Blockchain and crypto world. As a BNB Chain student ambassador, I got an excellent chance to be surrounded by professionals.
sa-voice-desc-Faizan: Blockchain tech bringing significant changes in many different fields for better future and it’s been a privilege for me to be the student ambassador of BNBChain. Let’s Educate for better tomorrow.
sa-benefit-title-2: of becoming a BNB Student Ambassador?
sa-benefit-desc-1: Get exclusive invites to all our events, either as a privileged guest or organizer.
sa-benefit-desc-2: Receive special access to members of the BNB Chain team and get invited to special BNB Chain Student Ambassador meet-ups featuring senior BNB Chain team members alongside our global Student Ambassador community.
sa-benefit-desc-3: You’ll also receive limited-edition gifts, made exclusively for BNB Chain Student Ambassadors.
sa-benefit-desc-4: Join the internship program and eventually join BNBChain as Full time employee.
sa-benefit-desc-5: Your feedback and suggestions will help shape the future of Web3
sa-banner-desc: The torch-bearers of our community that lead young students into learning and using the BNB Chain platform
sa-video-title: Build the community, and let the community Build, ’n Build!
sa-become-student-ambassador: Become a BNB Chain Student Ambassador
sa-become-student-ambassador-desc: Our Student Ambassador Program gives you a platform and frameworks to advance the blockchain and Web3 . You’ll have the opportunity to build authentic relationships and connect to a global community of Web3 developers and BNBChain ecosystems. If you’re interested in becoming a BNB Chain Student Ambassador, Join US today!
sa-become-building-force: Become the Building Force of an Innovative Tomorrow
sa-become-building-force-desc: As Student Ambassadors, you will join the building force to
sa-become-events-desc: Organize online or offline hackathons or meetups
